TopicTitle: Looking for a book and author by plot!

Articles.Content:
Long story short: the format of themittani.com changed for the worse and I can't find early book reviews. I've been meaning to read a book I read about there but it has been so long I don't remember anything about it but the plot, which is basically about slow interstellar colonization by corporate entities who later show up (years later) to "realize the assets" of the colony through military force.

Any help? TIA!
Looks interesting. I'll have to check it out when i find my ebook again.
